attributes.action: Stop TFL from removing free travel for under-18s
attributes.additional_details: Kids are unable to work it’s unfair for them to pay for transportation. if parents are in benefit it could be a huge problem, as kids go to school 5 times a week.
attributes.background: Stop TFL from removing free travel for under-18s.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331453
